Getting Started

Steps for getting started (example on right)

  1. Where you declare your app module, add ngTable:
    angular.module('myApp',['ngTable']);
  2. In your html file within the controller where you plan to use ng-table, add:
    <table ng-table>...</table>
  3. We are going to define a basic style for table in style.css: {% highlight css %} .ng-table { border: 1px solid #000; } {% endhighlight %}
  4. In your javascript file within the controller where you plan to use
    ng-table, lets add data that our table will use:
    5. {% highlight js %} $scope.users = [{name: "Moroni", age: 50}, {name: "Tiancum", age: 43}, {name: "Jacob", age: 27}, {name: "Nephi", age: 29}, {name: "Enos", age: 34}]; {% endhighlight %}
  5. Now create your table rows:
    ng-repeat="user in users"
